dict.acceptation: 萎靡不振，沮丧；下陷处，坑；衰弱；减缓；

sent.orig: Ludong fault depression was a sub-depression of Kailu, which had a fold-fault basement of anti-Mesozoic era.
sent.trans: 陆东断陷是开鲁盆地的次级断陷，形成于中生代，基底断裂可分为北北东向和近东西向两组。

sent.orig: Biyang depression, a part of fault depression, is a secondary structural unit of Nangxiang basin.
sent.trans: 泌阳凹陷是南襄盆地的一个次级凹陷，从北向南划分为：北部斜坡带、中部深凹带和南部陡坡带。

sent.orig: For information on depression following childbirth, see the topic Postpartum Depression.
sent.trans: 产后抑郁症请查看”产后抑郁“。

sent.orig: Even patients with clear-cut dementia and depression are less confused when their depression is treated.
sent.trans: 即便是诊无误的痴呆症和抑郁症患者，一旦接受治疗，他们的症状也会有所减轻。

sent.orig: Objective To explore the depression status of clients with cancer before operation asavoiding the depression.
sent.trans: 目的调查住院癌症患者在手术前的抑郁状态，探讨减轻患者出现焦虑抑郁的护理干预措施。
